channel.title: Best of playlists
channel.description:
So for 2017 and 2018 I made little best of playlists of all my favorite tracks I made from those years, just to document my growth as an artist
I was just wondering if I’m the only person to ever have done this and what kinda tracks people who do usually put on their playlists

item.title: Best of playlists
item.dc:creator: eohr
item.description:
This is a great idea! I set one up with my 5 best tracks:

https://soundcloud.com/eohr/sets/best-of-eohr

Read full topic

item.title: Best of playlists
item.dc:creator: GR3Y
item.description:
I’ve done that as well, but only for 2018 though. I just choose 8 - 10 of my favourite tracks I’ve made in the year.
